page.title: 05Wallaston Farm Part 2
page.content: I was surprised to see the farmer use a large wheeled tricycle instead of a dog,to get in the cows and sheep.He said it was much cheaper,and the jumbo wheels did not mark the soft ground in winter.There are many dangerous things on the farm perhaps the most dangerous being electricity from the overhead power cables and the many appliances on the farm.Farmers have to be careful all the time and must not take risks.The farmer told us that an angry cow was far worse than an angry bull because it will not give up and said he once had a cow chase the dog into the farmhouse,causing a great deal of damage,because the dog had barked at it's calf!
